verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> then אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> And the men אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> unto him Why hast thou הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> us thus הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this עָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> served לָּ֔נוּ לְבִלְתִּי֙ <S%H1115><s%> not קְרֹ֣אות <S%H7121><s%> that thou calledst לָ֔נוּ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> when הָלַ֖כְתָּ <S%H1980><s%> us not when thou wentest לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <S%H3898><s%> to fight בְּמִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> Midian וַיְרִיב֥וּן <S%H7378><s%> adversary אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> for בְּחָזְקָֽה׃ <S%H2394><s%> with him sharply

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> What עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> unto them What have I done עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> now כָּכֶ֑ם הֲל֗וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not ט֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> better עֹלְל֥וֹת <S%H5955><s%> now in comparison of you? [Is] not the gleaning אֶפְרַ֖יִם <S%H669><s%> of the grapes of Ephraim מִבְצִ֥יר <S%H1210><s%> than the vintage אֲבִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <S%H44><s%> Abiezer

בְּיֶדְכֶם֩ <S%H3027><s%> into your hands נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> the princes מִדְיָן֙ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹרֵ֣ב <S%H6159><s%> Oreb וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְאֵ֔ב <S%H2062><s%> and Zeeb וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and what יָּכֹ֖לְתִּי <S%H3201><s%> and what was I able עֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do כָּכֶ֑ם אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> Then רָפְתָ֤ה <S%H7503><s%> was abated רוּחָם֙ <S%H7307><s%> in comparison of you? Then their anger מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and בְּדַבְּר֖וֹ <S%H1696><s%> that הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> toward him when he had said הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> him

וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> came גִדְע֖וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon הַיַּרְדֵּ֑נָה <S%H3383><s%> to Jordan עֹבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> [and] passed over ה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <S%H7969><s%> he and the three מֵא֤וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for עֲיֵפִ֖ים <S%H5889><s%> that [were] with him faint וְרֹדְפִֽים׃ <S%H7291><s%> yet pursuing

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> unto the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth תְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> Give נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please כִּכְּר֣וֹת <S%H3603><s%> I pray you loaves לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of bread לָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּרַגְלָ֑י <S%H7272><s%> that follow כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עֲיֵפִ֣ים <S%H5889><s%> me for they [be] faint הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> like וְאָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> and I רֹדֵ֛ף <S%H7291><s%> and I am pursuing אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after זֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> kings מִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> of Midian

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> said שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> And the princes סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth הֲ֠כַף <S%H3709><s%> [Are] the hands זֶ֧בַח <S%H2078><s%> of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֛ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna עַתָּ֖ה <S%H6258><s%> already בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <S%H3027><s%> now in thine hand כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> should נִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> that we should give לִֽצְבָאֲךָ֖ <S%H6635><s%> appointed time לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said גִּדְע֔וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> right בְּתֵ֧ת <S%H5414><s%> hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Therefore when the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֥בַח <S%H2078><s%> Zebah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> into mine hand וְדַשְׁתִּי֙ <S%H1758><s%> then I will tear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <S%H1320><s%> your flesh אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with קוֹצֵ֥י <S%H6975><s%> with the thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> and with הַֽבַּרְקֳנִֽים׃ <S%H1303><s%> and with briers

וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> And he went up מִשָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there פְּנוּאֵ֔ל <S%H6439><s%> thence to Penuel וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> and spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> unto כָּזֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> unto them likewise וַיַּעֲנ֤וּ <S%H6030><s%> answered אוֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> and the men פְנוּאֵ֔ל <S%H6439><s%> of Penuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עָנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> had answered אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> as the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he spake גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> to the men פְנוּאֵ֖ל <S%H6439><s%> of Penuel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בְּשׁוּבִ֣י <S%H7725><s%> When I come again בְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> in peace אֶתֹּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> I will break down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּגְדָּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> this tower הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this פ

וְזֶ֨בַח <S%H2078><s%> Now Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֜ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna בַּקַּרְקֹ֗ר <S%H7174><s%> [were] in Karkor וּמַחֲנֵיהֶ֤ם <S%H4264><s%> and their hosts עִמָּם֙ <S%H5973><s%> with כַּחֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> fif עָשָׂר֙ <S%H6240><s%> teen אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand כֹּ֚ל <S%H3605><s%> that הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <S%H3498><s%> [men] all that were left מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> of all מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> of all the hosts בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> of the east וְהַנֹּ֣פְלִ֔ים <S%H5307><s%> for there fell מֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <S%H8025><s%> that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> sword

וַיַּ֣עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up גִּדְע֗וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַשְּׁכוּנֵ֣י <S%H7931><s%> of them that dwelt בָֽאֳהָלִ֔ים <S%H168><s%> in tents מִקֶּ֥דֶם <S%H6924><s%> on the east לְנֹ֖בַח <S%H5025><s%> of Nobah וְיָגְבֳּהָ֑ה <S%H3011><s%> and Jogbehah וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> and smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <S%H4264><s%> the host וְהַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> for the host הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> become בֶֽטַח׃ <S%H983><s%> was secure

וַיָּנ֗וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> fled זֶ֚בַח <S%H2078><s%> And when Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <S%H7291><s%> he pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> after וַיִּלְכֹּ֞ד <S%H3920><s%> them and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י ׀ <S%H8147><s%> the two מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> kings מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2078><s%> Zebah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> all the host הֶחֱרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and discomfited

וַיָּ֛שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned גִּדְע֥וֹן <S%H1439><s%> And Gideon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <S%H3101><s%> of Joash מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> from battle מִֽלְמַעֲלֵ֖ה <S%H4608><s%> before הֶחָֽרֶס׃ <S%H2775><s%> the sun

וַיִּלְכָּד־ <S%H3920><s%> And caught נַ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> a young man מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> of the men סֻכּ֖וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֑הוּ <S%H7592><s%> and enquired וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <S%H3789><s%> of him and he described אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> unto him the princes סֻכּוֹת֙ <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זְקֵנֶ֔יהָ <S%H2205><s%> and the elders שִׁבְעִ֥ים <S%H7657><s%> seventy-seven וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <S%H7651><s%> seven אִֽישׁ׃ <S%H376><s%> men

וַיָּבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H376><s%> the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said הִנֵּ֖ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold זֶ֣בַח <S%H2078><s%> Behold Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֑ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom חֵרַפְתֶּ֨ם <S%H2778><s%> with whom ye did upbraid אוֹתִ֜י <S%H853><s%> לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> me saying הֲ֠כַף <S%H3709><s%> [Are] the hands זֶ֣בַח <S%H2078><s%> of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֤ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna עַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> already בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> now in thine hand כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> should נִתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> that we should give לַאֲנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H376><s%> to your men הַיְּעֵפִ֖ים <S%H3286><s%> faint לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H3899><s%> bread

וַיִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> the elders הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> of the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קוֹצֵ֥י <S%H6975><s%> and thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַֽבַּרְקֳנִ֑ים <S%H1303><s%> and briers וַיֹּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> and with them he taught בָּהֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5523><s%> of Succoth

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> the tower פְּנוּאֵ֖ל <S%H6439><s%> of Penuel נָתָ֑ץ <S%H5422><s%> And he beat down וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֖ג <S%H2026><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> the men הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> of the city

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to זֶ֙בַח֙ <S%H2078><s%> he unto Zebah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <S%H6759><s%> and Zalmunna אֵיפֹה֙ <S%H375><s%> What הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> of men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom הֲרַגְתֶּ֖ם <S%H2026><s%> [were they] whom ye slew בְּתָב֑וֹר <S%H8396><s%> destruction וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> said כָּמ֣וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> As thou כְמוֹהֶ֔ם <S%H3644><s%> were like אֶחָ֕ד <S%H259><s%> [art] so [were] they each one כְּתֹ֖אַר <S%H8389><s%> resembled בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of a king

וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> And he said אַחַ֥י <S%H251><s%> They [were] my brethren בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> [even] the sons אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> of my mother הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> like חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> [as] the LORD ל֚וּ <S%H3863><s%> if הַחֲיִתֶ֣ם <S%H2421><s%> ye had saved them alive אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הָרַ֖גְתִּי <S%H2026><s%> I would not slay אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> And he said לְיֶ֣תֶר <S%H3500><s%> unto Jether בְּכוֹר֔וֹ <S%H1060><s%> his firstborn ק֖וּם <S%H6965><s%> Up הֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> [and] slay אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁלַ֨ף <S%H8025><s%> drew הַנַּ֤עַר <S%H5288><s%> them But the youth חַרְבּוֹ֙ <S%H2719><s%> not his sword כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because יָרֵ֔א <S%H3372><s%> for he feared כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> was still נָֽעַר׃ <S%H5288><s%> because he [was] yet a youth
